snippet: Zynga, the maker of online games, it expected a net loss of 12 to 14 cents a share following weak demand for some of its titles.
abstract: Zynga expects third-quarter loss of 12 to 14 cents a share; forecasts revenue of $300 million to $305 million, following weak demand for some of its online game titles.
lead_paragraph: Zynga, the maker of online games, it expected a net loss of 12 to 14 cents a share following weak demand for some of its titles.

headline.seo: Zynga to Report a Loss for the Third Quarter
headline.main: Zynga Expects a Loss for the Quarter
headline.print_headline: Zynga, Maker of Online Games, Expects a Loss for the Quarter
